name: @most/hold
description: Emit latest event to new observers

scripts.build-dist: mkdir -p dist && rollup -e most/lib/source/MulticastSource src/hold.js | babel --presets es2015 --plugins transform-es2015-modules-umd --module-id '@most/hold' -o dist/hold.js
scripts.build: npm run build-dist && uglifyjs dist/hold.js -o dist/hold.min.js
scripts.lint: jscs -x src && jsinspect src && eslint src
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test-main && npm run check-coverage

author: brian@hovercraftstudios.com
